item.description:
Build Your Buyers List Instantly With Cash Buyers

After this meeting you will instantly have access to over 150,000 cash buyers EVERY MONTH.

GAME CHANGING STUFF!!!

Seriously . . . this is how this list will help you:

1. Instant buyers list for all your future real estate deals
2. Tens of thousands of saved dollars when you sell the property instead of a realtor because you have a list of cash buyers
3. You can work backwards: find out what deals the cash buyers want and then go find them a deal and flip it to them
4. REO flips will be so much easier when your buyer doesn't need a loan
5. Pre-foreclosure-Short Sale A to B - B to C closings are easier as well because there will be no seasoning issues
6. Just put in your state, your county, and the value of the property sold and hit submit . . . and voila you have a list of every cash buyer:

- the property address they bought
- the date they closed
- how much they paid
- their full name
- their mailing address
- Get ready to be blown away! You don't want to miss this one!

Monthly Meeting

Thursday, September 16, 2010

Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

free for members; only $25 for guests

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Boston AREIA Monthly Meeting - Kent Clothier
